1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old orphan who has no where to live and longs for something adventure (and a beautiful women to perve on).

One day Jack discoveres a drug that rumoured to take you anywhere in the galaxy and gives a weird experience. It was also rumoured that the people who take this drug usually disappears.

Jack tries it for curiousity and ends up blacking out

Jack then wakes up in a strange environment and realises that he is the same size as an Ant.

You are where in the Star Wars Universe.
1.title: Shrunk In Star Wars

15.content: Where else would you like.
15.title: Other

choices: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
152.content: Which movie are you in.
152.title: The Anthology Shows

info.brief_description: You get shrunk in the Star Wars universe and must survive it’s hot Giantess PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are a character called Jack, a 13 year old boy in the Star Wars universe and you get shrunk to the size of a Ant.

RULED:
Keep It Unaware (if found he is a bug or alien)
No Deaths
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
Keep If Focused On Females Only (Maybe Couples In Sex But No Solo Males)
Try To Describe What The Characters Look Like
